titlestmt.titleproper: Rockefeller University records, Rockefeller University Press, Graphic Services, Cuts
A Guide to the Rockefeller University records, Rockefeller University Press, Graphic Services, Cuts FA932

did.unittitle: Rockefeller University records, Rockefeller University Press, Graphic Services, Cuts

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation note
prefercite.p: Information regarding the Rockefeller Archive Center's preferred elements and forms of citation can be found at http://www.rockarch.org/research/citations.php

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open for research. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Collection of "cuts" for half-tones and other illustrations which were used in printing the pamphlet "Addresses at the opening of the laboratory in 1906." Some of the "cuts" were not used.

Each wrapped individually and labeled as follows: 1. Frontispiece, 2. General library and reading room, 3. General chemical laboratory, 4. Special operating room on roof, 5. Microphotographic room, 6. Drying cage for animals, 7. Bacteriological cleaning room, 8. Director's laboratory and study, 9. General photographic room, 10. Animal Hospital, 11. Animal House and covered way to laboratory building.
Envelope with 11 illustrations taken from the pamphlet and labeled to correspond with the numbering on the packages.
3 additional packages marked "P". Drawings and lettering of buildings at Department of Animal Pathology, Princeton, dated 1915.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Due to the nature and potentially brittle condition of this material, special arrangements may be required in order to view materials. Individual items may be restricted due to preservation concerns.
